entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
